Package com.ikalagaming.core.packages

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IPlugin
    An interface that extends the package interface.
    Package
    A distinct chunk of the program with a specific purpose and methods for managing its state and interacting with the main program.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PackageSettings
    Configurable settings that allow changing the behavior of the package system.
    Plugin
    A package that is loaded from an external source.
    PluginDescription
    Contains data about a particular plugin.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PackageState
    The package state is a simple way of determining what a package is doing and whether or not it can be interacted with or perform tasks.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidDescriptionException
    A description could not be created correctly.
